jobs.title: Head of Engineering (VPE)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About the Role

We're looking for a Head of Engineering to lead our engineering team and drive our technical vision in generative AI. 

As a hands-on builder in an early-stage company, you will lead our technology strategy, set a high bar for innovation and technical rigor, and create an engineering culture that is ambitious, collaborative, accountable, and deeply customer-focused. You will ensure that our technology is not only scalable and robust but also sets new standards in the fields of AI, 3D and web. Finally, you are exceptionally articulate and able to showcase our technical achievements to industry peers, recruits, customers and investors. You start with a solid foundation of 5-6 exceptional engineers, working as a distributed team, to which you will recruit new talent through your network. 

Location: Preference for SF/Bay Area, CA. Open to remote candidates in North America & Western EU.

Responsibilities

  • Set Technical Strategy: Understand trends in generative AI, LLMs and software, aligning advancements in LLMs, generative models, and creative tools with company goals.

  • Lead by Example: Write and review code that sets a high bar for technical innovation and problem-solving, as part of how you lead. Use AI as part of how we build.

  • Build and Grow the Team: Have a strong network of low-ego, high-performance talent. Foster a collaborative, accountable and ambitious team culture.

  • Shape the Product Journey: Guide the technical roadmap and manage the team so stay abreast of the newest developments in generative AI research.

  • Drive Optimization and Scalability: Refine our AI and 3D stack to optimize performance, reduce reliance on third-party tools, and support scalable, high-performance workflows.

  • Harness Insights and Feedback: Build analytics and feedback systems to combine the right balance of high-performance and innovation.

  • Deliver Results: Break complex projects into actionable milestones, driving transformative product development for faster, more imaginative creative workflows.

Key Competencies

  • Hands-on Leadership with Modern Tech Stack: Strong technical skills with recent, hands-on experience in core tools like foundational models, RAG frameworks, knowledge graphs, frontend frameworks like three.js, Vercel, and open standards like WebGL/WebGPU. 

  • 3D Interactive: You understand the intricacies of building 3D and interactive experiences and can set the technical foundation for these capabilities.

  • Entrepreneurial Spirit: You are comfortable in fast-paced, early-stage environments and have a referenceable track record of things you have personally helped ship. 

  • Networked and Respected: You have a proven developer network, and know how to attract talented engineers who can push technical boundaries in 3D, AI, and generative experiences.

  • User-Obsessed: You have sufficient discerning taste in polished products and a commitment to delivering an exceptional end-user experience.

  • Driven by Excellence and Results: You’re meticulous about quality and measurable results, leading your team to surpass expectations while meeting crucial deadlines.

  • Values-Centered Leadership: You embody Intangible’s values, from open communication and supporting your team to staying focused on delivering incredible value to our users.

Outcomes

  • Steer the ship. Join the founders on the management team and help chart a path to building Intangible into a massively valuable business.

  • Deliver what matters. Partner with the founders to deliver a product that demonstrates high retention and paying customers within the first 3-6 months of 2025, unlocking capital for the next stage of our business. 

  • Ship early and often: Ensure new features are ready quickly, with a focus on memorable experiences for our users. Lead the charge in setting the bar high.

  • Stay ahead of the pack. Leverage the latest developments in software and AI to build features that keep wowing customers and the industry. 

  • Partner in a complex world. Build collaborative technical relationships with incumbents and startups in the AI and software space. 

  • Keep the bar high. Recruit, organize and set the tone for the team, to ensure that Intangible remains a place where great engineers feel at home, accountable, inspired and valued.

  • Clean codebase. Build a flexible codebase and structure that allows us to innovate quickly without sacrificing quality and reliability.

  • Successful Launches: From early prototypes to full-scale products, make sure we are delivering on time and setting the stage for customer success.

About Intangible

Intangible is building the world's simplest 3D storytelling tool for film, agencies, games, and events powered by AI. We make constructing 3D experiences dramatically faster, cheaper and more collaborative for creative, distributed teams. 

We are an interdisciplinary team of engineers, artists and designers that have built and shipped multiple end-to-end products at companies like Apple, Unity, Pixar, ILM and Electronic Arts. Intangible is seed funded by a16z Speedrun, Crosslink Capital and prominent angels.

What it’s like to work at Intangible:

  • We care a lot about using AI to empower creatives making games, film, XR and web.

  • We are all doers. We care about shipping often, and with intent.

  • The best idea wins. We want opinionated people who debate respectfully. 

  • We value people with consistently good judgment, regardless of rank.

  • We value teammates that build trust with each other and check egos at the door.

To learn more, check out:

✨Website

✨Demo video

✨ Intangible Overview

Benefits

  • We are a remote-first company with a small concentration in the Bay Area.

  • Health insurance for you and your dependants

  • 401(k) plan 

  • Flexible PTO

 - Flexible PTO

jobs.title: Machine Learning Engineer (AI/ML)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About the Role

We’re looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to join our growing team. You'll play a principal role in designing and building AI assistants that empower people to use interactive 3D as a medium.

Location: Preference for SF/Bay Area, CA. Open to remote candidates in North America & Western EU.

Responsibilities

  • Analyze opportunities for improving the AI system's performance and personalization.

  • Build NLP pipelines that extract intent, entities, and semantic structure from user input.

  • Integrate cloud and client LLMs to drive creative workflows.

  • Design and maintain knowledge graphs to represent world, character, and story data.

  • Prototype and apply AI features in collaboration with product and engineering teams.

  • Fine-tune or augment foundation models for domain-specific tasks.

Key Competencies

  • Evidence of exceptional ability in software development .

  • Understanding of ML principles, algorithms, and evaluation metrics.

  • Strong experience with modern NLP/LLM frameworks (e.g., Transformers, LangChain).

  • Experience with data storage and retrieval with vector databases.

  • Experience with graph databases (e.g., Neo4j, RDF, property graphs).

  • Proficient in Python and ML libraries (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow).

  • Ability to ship features end-to-end.

Ideal Candidate Has:

  • Experience building AI copilots.

  • Experience building recommendation systems.

  • Cloud ops (Azure, AWS, GCP) and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) experience.

  • Background in computational linguistics or knowledge representation.

About Intangible

Intangible is building the world's simplest 3D storytelling tool for film, agencies, games, and events powered by AI. We make constructing 3D experiences dramatically faster, cheaper and more collaborative for creative, distributed teams.  

We are an interdisciplinary team of engineers, artists and designers that have built and shipped multiple end-to-end products at companies like Apple, Unity, Pixar, ILM and Electronic Arts. Intangible is seed funded by a16z Speedrun, Crosslink Capital and prominent angels.

What it’s like to work at Intangible:

  • We care a lot about using AI to empower creatives making games, film, XR and web.

  • We are all doers. We care about shipping often, and with intent.

  • The best idea wins. We want opinionated people who debate respectfully. 

  • We value people with consistently good judgment, regardless of rank.

  • We value teammates that build trust with each other and check egos at the door.

To learn more, check out:

✨Website

✨Demo video

✨Intangible Overview

Benefits 

  • We are a remote-first company with a small concentration in the Bay Area.

  • Health insurance for you and your dependants

  • 401(k) plan 

  • Flexible PTO

jobs.title: Backend Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About the Role

We're looking for a Backend Engineer strong in DevOps to help scale our infrastructure. You’ll build and maintain APIs, services, and pipelines that power our creative tools—ensuring speed and reliability through growth. We’re especially interested in candidates with deep experience in asynchronous and real-time collaboration.

Location: Preference for SF/Bay Area, CA. Open to remote candidates in North America & Western EU.

Responsibilities

  • Develop and maintain server-side features and APIs.

  • Design scalable systems and ensure high performance and availability; “4 Nines”.

  • Build and manage CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure.

  • Monitor, debug, and optimize services in production.

  • Integrate third-party services such as AI, payments, analytics.

Key Competencies

  • Evidence of exceptional ability in software development.

  • Proficient in back-end languages (e.g., Python, Typescript for Node.js).

  • Strong experience with databases (SQL, Postgres, NoSQL, GraphQL).

  • Experience managing and migrating cloud ops (AWS, Azure, GCP).

  • Clear communicator and collaborative mindset.

  • Using AI in your day-to-day.

Ideal Candidate Has:

  • Experience implementing multi-level access and permission systems.

  • Experience implementing realtime multiplayer systems.

  • Experience with 3D tools or creative platforms.

  • Experience with AI/ML workflows.

  • Passion for building creative tools and empowering artists.

  • Knowledge of Web Transport + HTTP3.

About Intangible

Intangible is building the world's simplest 3D storytelling tool for film, agencies, games, and events powered by AI. We make constructing 3D experiences dramatically faster, cheaper and more collaborative for creative, distributed teams. 

We are an interdisciplinary team of engineers, artists and designers that have built and shipped multiple end-to-end products at companies like Apple, Unity, Pixar, ILM and Electronic Arts. Intangible is seed funded by a16z Speedrun, Crosslink Capital and prominent angels.

What it’s like to work at Intangible:

  • We care a lot about using AI to empower creatives making games, film, XR and web.

  • We are all doers. We care about shipping often, and with intent.

  • The best idea wins. We want opinionated people who debate respectfully. 

  • We value people with consistently good judgment, regardless of rank.

  • We value teammates that build trust with each other and check egos at the door.

To learn more, check out:

✨Website

✨Demo video

✨Intangible Overview

Benefits 

  • We are a remote-first company with a small concentration in the Bay Area.

  • Health insurance for you and your dependants

  • 401(k) plan 

  • Flexible PTO

jobs.title: Applied AI Engineer (Image/Video Diffusion)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About the Role

We’re looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to join our growing team. You'll play a principal role in designing and building AI assistants that empower people to use interactive 3D as a medium.

Location: Preference for SF/Bay Area, CA. Open to remote candidates in North America & Western EU.

Responsibilities

  • Develop and optimize visual generative AI models (e.g. Stable Diffusion, Flux) for fast inference and high-quality outputs.

  • Design inference pipelines to deliver real-time or near-real-time visual content generation in production environments.

  • Fine-tune foundation models or adapt pre-trained visual models for domain-specific creative tasks (e.g. 3D asset generation, style transfer).

  • Prototype and integrate AI-driven visual features in collaboration with product and engineering teams.

  • Analyze and improve model performance, balancing latency, quality, and computational efficiency.

  • Build and maintain data pipelines for processing and augmenting visual datasets (e.g. images, 3D models, textures).

  • Collaborate with artists and designers to ensure AI outputs meet creative and aesthetic standards.

  • Innovate out-of-the-box creative solutions by leveraging existing generative technologies (e.g. pre-trained models, open-source frameworks) to achieve exceptional visual results tailored to user needs.

Key Competencies

  • Proven expertise in software development with a focus on AI/ML applications.

  • Deep understanding of visual generative AI principles, including diffusion models, GANs, and VAEs.

  • Strong experience with modern ML frameworks (e.g., PyTorch, TensorFlow) and visual AI libraries (e.g., Hugging Face Diffusers, OpenCV).

  • Proficiency in optimizing models for fast inference (e.g., quantization, pruning, knowledge distillation).

  • Experience with visual data processing and storage, including vector databases for embeddings (e.g., Pinecone, Weaviate).

  • Proficient in Python and related ML/visual processing libraries (e.g., PIL, NumPy, Blender Python API).

  • Ability to ship end-to-end AI features in production environments.

Ideal Candidate Has:

  • Experience building real-time visual AI systems for creative applications (e.g., 3D modeling, animation, or game development).

  • Background in computer graphics, 3D rendering, or computational design.

  • Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and containerization (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) for deploying AI models.

  • Experience with hardware acceleration (e.g., CUDA, TensorRT) for optimizing visual model inference.

  • Knowledge of creative tools (e.g., Blender, Unreal Engine, Unity) and their integration with AI pipelines.

  • Contributions to open-source visual AI projects or research in generative AI optimization.

About Intangible

Intangible is building the world's simplest 3D storytelling tool for film, agencies, games, and events powered by AI. We make constructing 3D experiences dramatically faster, cheaper and more collaborative for creative, distributed teams.  

We are an interdisciplinary team of engineers, artists and designers that have built and shipped multiple end-to-end products at companies like Apple, Unity, Pixar, ILM and Electronic Arts. Intangible is seed funded by a16z Speedrun, Crosslink Capital and prominent angels.

What it’s like to work at Intangible:

  • We care a lot about using AI to empower creatives making games, film, XR and web.

  • We are all doers. We care about shipping often, and with intent.

  • The best idea wins. We want opinionated people who debate respectfully. 

  • We value people with consistently good judgment, regardless of rank.

  • We value teammates that build trust with each other and check egos at the door.

To learn more, check out:

✨Website

✨Demo video

✨Intangible Overview

Benefits 

  • We are a remote-first company with a small concentration in the Bay Area.

  • Health insurance for you and your dependants

  • 401(k) plan 

  • Flexible PTO
